definition: to recover (stolen property)/to pursue and force sb to give back the spoils
to counter accusations/to protest/to remonstrate/to retort/to plead/to demur/a plea (of not guilty)/a defense (against an allegation)/to enter a plea to a charge (in a law court)
to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
to bear joint responsibility for sth/joint liability (law)
loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)
